content.question: The mass spectrum for an unknown element is shown above. According to the information in the spectrum, the atomic mass of the unknown element is closest to

choices.label: <math alttext="90 a m u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>90</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>amu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="91 a m u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>91</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mtext></mtext><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>amu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="93 a m u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>93</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>amu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="94 a m u" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>94</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>amu</mtext></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="91 a m u" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>91</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mtext></mtext><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>amu</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
